title: The trumpet of vvarre A sermon preached at Paules Crosse the seuenth of Maie 1598. By M. Steph. Gosson parson of great Wigborow in Essex.
author: Gosson, Stephen, 1554-1624.
publisher: By V. S[immes] for I. O[xenbridge] dwelling in Paules churchyard at the signe of the parot,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
